templates.description: Shows total keyword count and RPP count
Top 3 priority RPP keywords to focus on
Shows expansion status with current RPP count

placeholders.total: Total keyword count - number of all keywords for this product
placeholders.rpp: RPP keyword count - number of keywords that have RPP rankings > 0
placeholders.rppTop2: Top 2 RPP keywords - first 2 keywords with RPP ranks > 0, joined with ・ (e.g. 'キーワード1・キーワード2')
placeholders.rppTop3: Top 3 RPP keywords - first 3 keywords with RPP ranks > 0, joined with ・ (e.g. 'キーワード1・キーワード2・キーワード3')
